sentence: The topic has also become an issue on the campaign trail, with several candidates, including Pennsylvania Senate candidates John Fetterman and Rep. Connor Lamb, coming out in support of a ban.
author: Paul Blumenthal
title: Pelosi Skeptical Of Need To Ban Trading Stock In Congress: It’s About ‘Trusting Our Members’

author: Dave Goldiner
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene tries to laugh off gazpacho-Gestapo mix-up
